Xalqaro ijtimoiy innovatsiyalar universi: Rector of the International University of Social Innovations Ulugbek Azizov visited the University of Tsukuba, Japan.
A meeting between the representatives of the International University of Social Innovations and Japanese company AOIKAI was held in Tashkent.
Rector of the International University of Social Innovations Ulugbek Azizov visited Teachers College at Columbia University, the United States.
Rector of the International University of Social Innovations Ulugbek Azizov visited the Center for European, Russian, and Eurasian Studies at Michigan State University, the United States.
<h1>Universitetlararo hamkorlik</h1><p>2:
Inter-university cooperation

Rector of the International University of Social Innovations Ulugbek Azizov visited the University of Tsukuba, Japan. The aim – to establish bilateral academic collaboration between the universities, discuss the possibilities of starting the students and teachers’ mobility and exchange as well as establishing dual degree programs at the International University of Social Innovations in the future.

During the visit U.Azizov conducted a lecture on the higher education in Uzbekistan, in which the students of the Tsukuba University took part.

U.Azizov studied at the University of Tsukuba during 2008-2009, where he got his Master of Art in International Studies.
<h1>Universitetlararo hamkorlik</h1><p>X:
Inter-university cooperation

A meeting between the representatives of the International University of Social Innovations and Japanese company AOIKAI was held in Tashkent. AOIKAI specializes in attracting specialists from all over the world with the Japanese language skills to fulfill the needs of the Japanese job market. The sides discussed the perspectives of attracting future students of the International University of Social Innovations to pursue their career path in Japan.

Inter-university cooperation

Rector of the International University of Social Innovations Ulugbek Azizov visited Teachers College at Columbia University, the United States. The aim – to establish bilateral academic collaboration between the universities, discuss the possibilities of starting the students and teachers’ mobility and exchange.

Inter-university cooperation

Rector of the International University of Social Innovations Ulugbek Azizov visited the Center for European, Russian, and Eurasian Studies at Michigan State University, the United States. The aim – to establish bilateral academic collaboration between the universities, discuss the possibilities of conducting researches by the scholars of the Center at the International University of Social Innovations.
Xalqaro ijtimoiy innovatsiyalar universi: I have the honor to welcome you all on the website of the International University of Social Innovations.
Universitetimiz 2023 yil 5-iyunda Toshke: Our university was founded on June 5 2023 in the city of Tashkent, Uzbekistan. Starting from September 2024 we are ready to open our doors to freshmen. We strongly believe that our students will use all opportunities created in our university to obtain best knowledge, who further will serve for the development of Uzbekistan.
Universitetimiz ijtimoiy fanlarni o’qiti: While specializing in teaching social sciences, the University is planning to offer 16 undergraduate and 2 graduate degree programs, including:
Filologiya va tillarni o’qitish (ingliz,: Philology and language studies (English, Korean, Japanese, Chinese)
Shuni e’tirof etish joizki, Xalqaro ijti: It is necessary to mention that the International University of Social Innovations employed best teachers who possess doctoral degrees and are qualified with more than 10 years of lecturing experience. They are from Uzbekistan, the United States, India, and Russian.
Universitetimizda o’quv jarayonlari “mar: In our university, the learning and teaching process will be organized based on the principle of “student-centered education”, in which the modern pedagogical frames (cooperative, inquiry-based, and problem-based learning) will be applied widely. All these will contribute to an environment, in which students will learn independently and they will be able to develop their creative and critical thinking as well as professional skills.
Shularni inobatga olgan holda universite: Consequently, our teaching and learning philosophy relies on the principle of “independent learning by students”. To put into practice this philosophy we jointly with the specialties of Michigan State University (the United States) have created an electronic educational platform called DiGi IUSI, via which all learning and teaching processes will be digitalized.
Ijtimoiy muammolarga nazariy va amaliy y: At our university, students will learn to find theoretical and practical solutions to existing and future social problems. Solving social problems with innovations!
Barchnagizni Xalqaro ijtimoiy innovatsiy: I am looking forward to meeting you all at the International University of Social Innovations.
Universitetimiz, talabalarni qabuli va u: You can get additional information on our university and how to become a freshman through our Facebook, Instagram, Telegram, and Linkedin.
Biz bilan saytimizdagi elektron arizani: You can send a message by filling in the form electronically via our website or connect by phone.
Universitet ta’limi va qabul borasida sa: Contact with us for IUSI University for inquiries, admissions, and more. We're here to assist you.
